title: raamam bajEham
sahitya:
rAmam bhajEham sadA rakSasa kula bhImam

anupallavi

 shyAmam sakala sujana hrdaya jaladhi sOmam janaka sutAbhi

caraNam 1

 sundara mukham aravinda nayana magha brnda parvata purandara manakha 
sanandana nutamAnanda jaladhi mahi brnda su-bhUSaNa vandita caritam
   
caraNam 2

 dhIram su-parivAram bhuvana dhAram suguNAkaram samA-
lankAram durjana dUram shrI raghivIram mE hrdi vAram vAram
   
caraNam 3

 rAjam nata sura rAjam stuta gajarAjam shruti vinutAjam suta 
ratirAjam turaga virAjam sujana samAjam tyAgarAjam rAjam
